data.meta_site_name: Kurrus Funeral Home in Belleville, Illinois
data.text:
Steven C. Campbell, 59, of , Highland, IL, born Thursday, April 30, 1964, in Belleville, IL, passed away Saturday, January 13, 2024 at St. John’s Hospital in Springfield, IL.

Steven worked as a Truck Driver for over 35 years. He was a member of Highland Masonic Lodge #583 and the Ainad Shrine Maclibo Circus Unit.

He was preceded in death by his:

Father: Roger Campbell

Brother: Danny Campbell

Surviving are his:

Loving wife: Deborah, nee Marquis, Campbell of Highland, IL

Mother: Loretta Campbell of Highland, IL

Step son: Tyler Holland of McLean, IL

Sister: Robin Pashia of Highland, IL

Nephew: Aaron Pashia

Fur baby: J.W.

Memorials: Memorials may be made to the Shriners Children’s Hospital.

Visitation: Visitation from 4:00 pm – 7:30 pm, Friday, January 19, 2024 at Kurrus Funeral Home in Belleville, IL.

Special Services: A Masonic service will be held at 7:30 pm on Friday, January 19, 2024 at Kurrus Funeral Home in Belleville, IL.
